112.content:
Ami woke up as per usual for the Saturday, rubbing her eye lids and restraining a 

yawn. Her panties and shirt needed some adjusting, but then again, her wardrobe barely 

changed, Ami being the one not to see why one needs new clothes every three months.

She turned on the stove and made some fragrant Orange Blossom Tea while she put 

three eggs to boil, which would be two too many for her if she was actually paying 

attention. She took out the books for which she would be teaching the subjects for 

Usagi, Minako, and Makoto while she munched on a few dangos that Usagi gave to her 

with respect one day after a study session last Saturday.'These are good,' Ami said to 

herself after the second skewer, 'I've got to ask Usagi where she got these.' After setting 

up the books and all that was necessary for the session and to her dismay, the dango 

box was empty after the sixth skewer. She shrugged it off and made herself a simple 

sandwich when the egg timer rang.



Ami turned off the stove and put the eggs under cold water as she peeled them, 

unconsciously snacking on a sandwich that she made to quiet her unusually hungry 

stomach. She set the eggs to cool and sprinkled a bit of salt over them, drooling with 

anticipation and with a bit of restraint, daintily devoured all three eggs. She giggled 

with some discontent, "If I keep this up, I'm going to be eating as much as Usagi, 

and I don't think that my body has the same metabolism as that girl." She heard the 

doorbell as she put the plate in the sink and went to her room to put on those worn 

pair of jeans that she had, frowning at how her hips were spilling out of the 

jeans when it usually slid over them nice and easily, but she didn't have time to 

ponder that. "I'm coming!" She yelled, running to the door and opening the door. 

"Good morning!" She said to the person at the door.
112.title: Ami's voluptuous hunger

choices: Go along with Rei and start dieting
Decide that dieting will cause more harm in the long run and end up hurting you
1121.content:
The red haired Japanese beauty Rei Hino, her black hair running down the scale of her back, smiled at Ami as she walked into the house. "Hi, Ami!"

"Rei! I didn't expect you to come--"

"So soon? Well, I needed to see something for myself is all," Rei replied in a nonchalant tone, but with a somewhat anxious expression on her face. Ami wondered, momentarily, what she was thinking. Her eyes darted toward Ami's middle, but she didn't understand just what Rei was looking at, exactly.

"Is something wrong, Rei?" Ami asked, confused.

Rei's expression changed to one of mild surprise as she struggled to beat around the bush. "Huh? Oh, yeah, actually, something is wrong," Rei's eyes narrowed as she glanced down at Ami's torso. "It just looks like you're taking after stupid Usagi."

"Huh? What do you mean?" Ami asked, curiously.

"You're smart, Ami. I know you are. Did you ever consider, uh, running? Exercise? Or are you too busy studying to get physical activity?"

"I'm not following you."

Rei slapped her forehead with her palm, shaking her head in disbelief. "Damn it! You've gained weight!"

"Oh, I have?" Ami glanced down at her belly. Sure enough, it was pudgier than she remembered it to be. She rested her hands on her convex torso. She noted, as she rested her hands on her larger tummy, that her hands had been swallowed up in fat, her knuckles completely consumed, her arms pudgier than before. Her belly had grown, but it wasn't a pot belly or anything like that. Just a tad doughy, soft, her love handles still small little things that rolled over the side of her pants. Her legs, she noticed, had also grown. She pinched a small bit of blubber on the inside of her thigh, mildly surprised she had overlooked that. "Thanks for pointing that out, Rei! I didn't notice it at all!"

"How couldn't you notice that? It's blubber! I mean, really, Ami, you need to pay attention more to your body. I thought you wanted to be a doctor! Aren't doctors supposed to know about this sort of stuff?"

"Well, yeah, but--"

"But nothing! You need to diet."

"But diets usually deplete the body of nutrition it needs to survive," Ami pointed out, truthfully.

"Yeah, but it looks like you've been getting a little too much nutrition lately."

Ami considered her options. She could diet, but that might affect her studying abilities. Too little food would keep her from being really awake enough to focus. On the other hand, fat did affect her health, and that might hurt her more in the long run. Rei was right: it was unhealthy, but she wasn't sure which was more unhealthy.
1121.title: "You're fat!"

choices: Ami decides she is rather cute chubby
Ami still wants to lose weight
11213.content:
Well, the one reasonable choice seemed, to her, to call Mako-chan. She loved cooking, so surely she, of all people, would know how to help her with loosing the extra pounds that had accumulated. Turning to Rei, the raven haired Japanese beauty that she was, the blue haired Ami asked, curiously, "Do you think it's a good idea I ask Mako-chan for help?"

Rei considered this. "Can't hurt, can it?"

"Guess you're right."

Ami dialed the phone, hoping that she wasn't intruding on something Mako-chan was doing. Thankfully, after two rings, Mako-chan's voice rang through Ami's ear. "Hello?"

"Mako-chan?"

"Ami? What's wrong? You sound a little upset."

"Well, you see, I have a small little problem," Ami replied, "I've gained a little weight."

"Oh, I see. So do you want me to help you exercise?"

Ami had forgotten entirely that Mako-chan was a martial artist and athlete. The big girl would surely help Ami out in more ways than one. Regardless, Ami replied, "That might help too, but I was actually calling to ask you about dietary help. I don't want to resort to an unhealthy diet, but I know that I need to lose weight. Is it possible I can stop by later, or maybe over the course of this month every so often so that you could cook something, uh--I'm intruding on you, aren't I?" Ami asked, blushing deep scarlet.

Mako-chan laughed. "No, actually, I'd be happy to help you out! Like, really, really happy! Please, do you want me to come to you, or you to come to me? Which is more convenient?"

"I'll go to you! I'm already intruding enough! Any more would be too much! Thank you so much!"

"It's not a problem. See you in, what, an hour?"

"An hour sounds wonderful! Thanks again!"

***

Rei had stayed for the next half-hour before finally leaving, stating how she was happy Ami was actually concerned with her weight as opposed to that stupid meatball head who was essentially fattening herself like a calf for market. After seeing Rei's back, Ami darted up the stairs, noting how her body jiggled slightly with every step. She was surprised. This wasn't something she was accustomed to. It actually felt a little strange for her. Maybe even pleasurable?

No! She mustn't think that way!

She walked into the bathroom, and removed her clothing. She took a closer look at her body in the mirror. Really, she wasn't chubby at all, just pudgier. It was clear she had gained weight. Her slender waist was now spilling outward, her hips had thickened, her legs had grown a soft layer of chub over them, and her arms and hands were following the same path. Her face had changed slightly as well, but it looked rather similar to her ordinary face.

As she started the water, she considered the way she looked. She wasn't unattractive any more, per say, was she? Fat wasn't attractive! Who was she kidding? Still, the voice in the back of her head that this body of hers wasn't so bad kept shouting at the top of its lungs. What a bother!
11213.title: Ask Mako-chan for help

choices: "Well, not what I expected, but I'm sure I can help you out just fine!"

112131.content:
It wasn't the healthiest health choice, but, as Ami approached Mako-chan's door, and wrapped her knuckles against the door, she knew she was making the right decision. At least, she felt she was. As Mako-chan answered the door, a smile on her lips, Ami didn't know how to articulate what she was about to say. How could she say that she enjoyed being thick, and, possibly, wanted to be a little bigger? She knew Mako-chan would know the healthiest way to become chubby, but how? How?

"Ami, come on in!" Mako-chan said, a smile on her lips as she beckoned for her to enter. Ami nodded, anxiously, and walked in. "Ah, I see you gained a little bit of weight." Mako-chan patted Ami on the butt, sending a brief ripple that ran through her thighs. Ami shuddered as she struggled not to give way to the pleasure she felt from that contact. Being reminded of her chub only made her smile.

Mako-chan picked up on this.

"Smiling?" Mako-chan asked, curiously, "I think I missed something here."

"Uh, well..." Ami blushed as she struggled to articulate herself, scratching her chin with her finger as she attempted to speak. "I came to a revelation as I was showering before."

"Uh-huh?"

"And I figure that, uh, I might need you to do something a little, uh, different with the whole diet thing."

"Okay, that's fine. I had a few ideas in case you didn't like the first one I--"

"That's not what I mean."

"Oh?"

"Well, what I'm saying is that I thing I like the way I look. In fact, I think I want to go on a, uh, reverse diet. I would actually like to expand my waistline. I'm sorry, but I don't know why, I just know it's the right decision. I don't want you to laugh, I just know that you might be able to help me reach that goal. I'm sorry if I sound weird or something, but, that's all."

Mako-chan remained silent for a few minutes, considering this. Ami felt butterflies flutter in her belly. Finally, Mako-chan said...

1121311.content:
"Seriously?" Ami asked, amazed by the response. She raised her eyebrows in her bewilderment. "I mean, this isn't a very common request."

"I know," Mako-chan replied, shrugging offhandedly, "But if it's an excuse to have a taste tester for my recipes, I'm all for it."

"A taste tester?"

Mako-chan gestured for a seat, one that Ami took, her hands consciously on her belly as she stared at Mako-chan, a rather happy grin on her lips. "I mean, I never thought you'd ask for this. I was going to use all of you girls as taste testers, but I guess, in the end, you'd be better if you're looking to gain weight. You see, in order to gain weight and keep your health, you need to do is eat lots of healthy foods."

"But what about the fat pressing against your internal organs or the stress on your heart from pumping blood thoughtout your entire body?" Ami asked, curiously.

"Well, relatively healthier."

"Alright, I suppose you're right," Ami replied.

"So how much heavier are we talking about?" Mako-chan asked, "Like 10 pounds? 20 pounds? 50 pounds?"

Ami shrugged. "I'm not sure yet. I can't say for sure. I don't know what it feels like yet."

"Okay, that's fine. Alright, just wait here, Ami. I'll cook up a storm for you!"

Ami sat down in a chair in Mako-chan's living room, reading a magazine. Conveniently enough, it was about food. Frowning as she read it, she waited as she felt hunger painfully claw against her insides, consuming her, enveloping her, driving her to long for the food that Mako-chan cooked. The smell, the glorious smell, was tugging at her, alluring her, teasing her. She longed to just take a bite of that food, to eat it, but she had to wait, had to bide her time. It would come eventually, soon, she just needed to wait.

"Well, dig in, Ami!" Mako-chan laughed, smiling in happiness as she placed a heaping plate of food on the table. The food was layed out in their own individual containers, and Mako-chan, who had a bowl of rice prepared for her as she grabbed her own chopsticks, handed Ami a heaping bowl of rice for her.

"This smells amazing, Mako-chan," Ami cooed, picking her chopsticks into her hands as she plucked a dumpling from its respective container, taking her time sampling each piece of food on the table.

"Please, eat as much as you can, Ami! I'm sure you'd enjoy it. Just try to eat to your fill now, which won't be a lot. Don't worry, though. I'll eat what you leave behind. My body has a better metabolism than yours."

Ami glanced over at Mako-chan as she chewed on her food. For a brief instant, Ami imagined what Mako would look like if she was chubbier, if she was thicker around the middle. The idea sent a pleasurable chill up her spin, but one she struggled to suppress with all her being. This was Mako-chan, her friend! What was she thinking? Well, she held herself back, and rather ate and ate until her belly was distented, until she couldn't take in another bite.

She leaned back comfortably in her chair, her hands on her tight stomach. "Mako-chan, thanks so much for the food!"

"Not a problem," Mako-chan responded, leaning back in a similar fashion, "Now, let me tell you, I only ate this with you because it's the first time we're doing this. Next time, you're on your own, okay?"

"Okay, thanks!"

"No problem."
1121311.title: The First Meal

choices: 170 - Wow, that's a lot more than expected...
11213111.content:
Ami was, at first, curious as to whether or not there was a faster way to reach her ideal weight, whatever that might be, but soon realized it was rather enjoyable to simply allow the flavors to fill her mouth like this. From that moment on, she'd find herself returning to Mako-chan's house rather frequently, asking for whatever meal Mako was cooking that night. Because Ami came around dinner time, Mako prepared enough for the meals for two people, which Ami could tell Mako-chan enjoyed, seeing as how she'd have company when she ate, as opposed to simply being alone at her house, nibbling on some dish she prepared in her lonesome abode. The sight of Mako-chan's face as Ami walked in, that bright smile, a cheery light that filled the room, was part of the pleasure of being with Mako-chan.

However, there was the second joy that came wiht it as well. By the end of the month, Ami tore the seat of her jeans while studying with the others. Blush filling her cherubic cheeks, she placed a pudgy hand to her soft derrier, her heart thumping with both embarressment and, for lack of a better word, pleasure.

"Did you just rip your pants?" Rei askd, her eyes widened as she stared at Ami.

"I apologize," Ami replied, breathlessly, "I didn't realize--"

"Mako-chan!" Rei snapped, "Aren't you supposed to be monitoring what she eats?"

Mako-chan, who was currently nibbling on a cookie from the batch she had brought to the study group, blushed deep red. Glancing away, she replied, "Well, she doesn't really want to lose weight, so--"

"Well, why wouldn't she?" Rei asked, more to Mako-chan and less to the subject of the conversation.

"Yeah, losing weight is real important to have an oh so sexy figure," Minako replied, posing at that moment, running her hand across her cheek as she pushed out her chest slightly before, after appreciating the ridiculousness of her position, broke out into a fit of giggles.

"This isn't a laughing matter!" Rei snapped, "I mean, Ami knows the risks associated with obesity, so--"

"She isn't obese," laughed Usagi. The blonde haired girl drew closer, whispering into the blunette's ears. "Don't listen to her, Ami. Rei's just jealous you have more talent than she does...oh, and your boobs are bigger."

"I'm not jealous! I heard that! And Usagi, you should be dieting too!" This was indeed a justified statement. Though Usagi ate twice as much as Ami did, she had only just begun to fill out. Her slight belly was pressing against the sweater she was wearing, her fuller thighs and hips bushing outward as she sat cross-legged on the ground. As she puffed out her cheeks in frustration, Ami noticed she had even started to grow slightly chubbier cheeks.

Usagi turned toward Rei, and snapped, "Oh, meanie? Well, what about the fact that I have a boyfriend and you don't, huh!?"

"That's only because you're destined to be together, meatball head!"

"What was that!?"

"Actually, now you have more of a meatball belly, so--"

"Look, no one needs to lose weight, okay?" Mako-chan stammered, holding her arms out, steadily, "Look, Rei, if you're so worried about Ami's diet, why don't you join us for dinner a few times? I guarentee you we're eating healthy food."

"Oh, I trust you are, just what bothers me is how much is Ami eating," Rei asked.

"I'm right here you know," Ami replied, in a meek tone.

"Join us then and find out!"

"Don't I have a say in this?" Ami replied, hiding her chubby cheeks behind a book.

"Alright! But first, let's weigh her!" Minako cheered.

"Were you even involved in the conversation?" Rei asked, bluntly.

"Well, no, but I felt left out, so--"

Ami was dragged off to the bathroom by her ear as Rei placed her on the scale. After a few minutes of adjusting, it read...

112131112.content:
“Mako-chan! Just what’ve you been feeding her, anyway?” Rei stammered, staring at Ami.

Had Ami really put on that much? She glanced over at the mirror. Her round face was luminous with a sort of light, not pride, not satisfaction, just simple acceptance. She had puffed up below her face, too, but not enough to qualify as a double chin on her thick neck. Her round shoulders rounded out two plump arms leading off to ten pudgy digits. Her breasts, she had breasts now, were large, beyond the width of her belly in any case, which had begun to droop over her pants line. Her hips, however, were wider than her belly, giving her a sort of hour glass look, albeit with her thunder thighs and bubble butt, it was a rather expanded hour glass.

She thought she looked cute.

Rei had other ideas on that matter.

“Mako-chan, Ami, this is really irresponsible!” Rei said, not bitchy, not cruel, but almost disappointed, as though the two of them had somehow let her down in their own little way. “Look, you two both know how unhealthy this all is. It can kill you. It isn’t a laughing matter! Obesity is deadly.”

“Well, we’ve been trying to sidestep that, and thankfully, as you can see, Ami gathers wait around her hips and chest, not her belly, so she’s actually healthier.”

“And where do you gain?” Rei asked, glancing at Mako-chan.

“My hips, evidently,” Mako-chan replied, blushing as she ran a hand over her, to Ami’s shock, slightly thicker hips. How had Ami missed her friend’s developments? She blushed deep red as she also noticed that her talent for large breasts had also not let her down, as her breasts were now poking through what appeared to be her bra, or at least the neckline of her oak green shirt. Mako-chan blushed over these developments, as did Ami, but for entirely different reasons.

Rei frowned too. “I noticed you put on some weight. Do you know how much?”

“I’m up to 132 right now,” Mako-chan replied, still scarlet, “Not too bad yet.”

“I’ll give you that. It isn’t 170.”

“Oh! I wouldn’t criticize her so much,” Usagi replied, “I’m 154.”

“Yeah, but Ami has a much lower metabolism than you! You eat your body weight on a regular basis! If I ate as much as you, I’d be larger than a cruise ship! This is your comeuppance! Deal with it!”

“Ami-chan! Rei’s being mean to be again,” Usagi pouted, her crocodile tears running alongside her eyelashes, never gracing her chubby cheeks with their presence.

“Why don’t you all just come for a week for my little meals?” Mako-chan asked, grinning, her dimples emerging on her cheeks.

“It sounds reasonable,” Rei replied, frowning, “Of course, I won’t gain weight.”

“Oh boy!” Usagi cheered, punching the air triumphantly.

“I suppose it can’t hurt—oh, food? I’m in!” Minako cheered.

Ami grinned. She didn’t know what was going to happen next, but she felt herself tingle that special way she had before. Her fingers twitched, her eyes widened, and she felt a strong desire for food emerge in her heart—er—stomach.

1121311122.content:
The first day the quintet sat down around Matoko's table, Ami felt a tad nervous. Usagi was almost drooling, barely containing herself at the present time, Minako in a similar state, but Rei, on the other hand, stared at them all judgmentally, as though critiquing what was going on around her. Ami felt her skin prickle uncomfortably as she awaited her ultimate fate to come.

"Seriously, I can see why she's so big," Rei said, staring at the plates of food being carried over, "This is enough for a wedding."

"It's not THAT much," Makoto laughed, "I'm sure y'all be able to finish it."

Rei held her chopsticks in her fingers, hesitating to eat. Ami was the first to dive in, along with Usagi. However, Ami was more refined with her dive, making it a graceful twirl into her food, sampling each dish with grace and elegance, while Usagi headlong cannon balled into the food, shoving all she could reach into her mouth. Makoto ate next, and ate in a manor more akin to Ami, refined, controlled.

When Minako sampled the first bite, Ami could see the flavors spreading over her pallet. She went nuts, diving into the food just like Usagi. Aside from one of them being chubby, you could barely notice a difference. Rei stared apprehensively at her food, gulping her own saliva initially before placing some in her mouth, and chewing. Her muscles tensed, only to slowly relax as she moaned in pleasure.

"That is delicious," Rei cooed, smiling slightly to herself, sampling another taste, in a controlled manor.

"So you do like it?" Makoto asked, "Can you see how Ami fattened herself up on this food?"

"I have a better idea, yes," Rei replied, "Still, I know I won't gain weight."

"Oh really?" Mako-chan asked, smirking, "Is that a challenge?"

"No, of course not, it's a fact," Rei replied.

"I bet I can make you fat, alright? That's my bet."

"And I say it's impossible, because I won't eat your food if that's the case."

But they all returned the next day for food.

"Usagi-chan! Hi!" Ami said in her gentle tone, glancing down for a moment at the bag of sweets in her hands, "What do you have there?"

Usagi giggled a moment before extending her bag, a grin on her lips. "Do you want some?"

"Well, I really shouldn't--"

"Ami, Ami! Do I ever think about that stuff?"

"No."

"Do I ever suffer the consequences of that kind of stuff?" Usagi asked, bluntly.

"What's that supposed to mean?" Usagi asked, cocking her head in confusion. Ami glanced down at her torso along with Usagi. When she had said that, Ami specifically was referencing that one time where Usagi had broken that containment thingy of hers while fighting the Amazon Trio, but saw, in surprise, that those words applied to this very moment. Usagi had gained weight. Although she wasn't fat by any means, she sure wasn't skinny either. Her body had thickened up, her thighs had expanded slightly, her arms had become softer, less defined, but didn't look too different. It was understandable that Usagi, in haste, might have overlooked the changes in her body. Now, however, the changes hadn't escaped her scan. Her eyes grew watery as she fell to her knees, tears spilling from her eyes in torrents. "I'm fat! I'm so disgustingly fat, aren't I? Waaawaaahhh...."

Ami drew nearer to poor Usagi, patting her on the back. "Don't worry! I'm sure you'll be fine."

"Ami-chan..."

"Do you want me to give you ideas how to maybe lose weight?" Ami asked.

"How, Ami-chan?"

Ami wasn't any food guru. That was Mako-chan's area of expertise. Considering the options briefly, Ami said, simply, "Stop eating sweets."

Usagi considered this for a grand total of five seconds before saying, bluntly...

Ami heard Usagi's words, but it took a few seconds for them to sink in. She rested her fingers alongside her middle, prodding them gently. She felt the flesh give, soft and palpable. Ami considered this. She wasn't sure if dieting was a wise idea. After all, it could backfire and have worse effects on both of them. Besides, over the last few weeks, she had developed a sweet tooth. The idea of giving up her sweets was a bit difficult...

Usagi sighed after the afternoon bell rang and right when she was going to leave 

the class, Her teacher held her back. Ami got the clue and waited for Usagi outside 

of the class, Usagi telling her during lunch that she needed to speak with Ami in 

private. Usagi got a light warning, an extra credit assignment, she went through the 

motions and mechanically nodding when necessary, something else on her mind. 

Usagi took Ami to their favorite place to hang out, the ice cream parlor, to talk and 

drown out her anxiety in seaweed ice cream.



"Usagi...what was it that you wanted to tell me?" Ami said, taking a spoonful or two 

afterwards. Usagi ate through nearly half of the three scoop cup before responding.



"Well...you remember that time when we tried it....on the rainy day that you got 

stuck in my house?" Usagi said barely above a whisper, blushing profusely. Instantly 

there was a blush on the water senshi's cheeks.



"Yeah...but what about it?" Ami asked, wondering what direction this conversation 

was going.



"Well...I missed my period about three weeks after that happened and I decided to 

take a pregnancy test, since I was feeling all sorts of weird things and so I took the 

test and it came out...positive..." Usagi whispered, the star of Mercury confounded 

by this, more than anything. "And I haven't done it with anyone since then...."



'This cannot be! I can't do things like that....'Ami thought to herself, but ultimately 

resigned from trying to reason out the possibilities to be nothing less of a miracle. 

"When are you due, Usagi?" Ami asked, noticing that the moon senshi's uniform 

was stretched out slightly, but she always thought that the sudden growth was 

because Usagi's gluttony was finally cathing up to her, not that her child was 

growing inside of Usagi! What could she do? How could she support this child that 

Usagi was miraculously concieving?
